package step4;

public class MyRunnable implements Runnable {
	private int num;
	
    public MyRunnable() {
    	this(0);
    }
    
    public MyRunnable(int num) {
    	this.num=num;
    }
	
	@Override
	public void run() {
    	int result = 1;
		for(int i=1;i<=num;i++)
            result*=i;
        
        try {
			Thread.sleep(5);
		} catch (InterruptedException e) {
			// TODO Auto-generated catch block
			e.printStackTrace();
		}
    	System.out.println(result);
	}

}
